page.title: 07Uley Parish Council
page.content: There are seven members of the Parish Council who attend Parish Council meetings. One of these is a District Councillor. The Parish Council does quite a lot of things. When anybody wants to build a house or start a new industry or change something in the village,they have to send a plan in to the District Council,who decide whether you can do this or not. All these plans are sent to the Parish Council because the Parish Council knows its area best of all.The other important rule for the village of Uley is producing grants for the village facilities. They have a budget of money from which to do this which is raised from the rates. The grants go to the village hall,of which the Parish Council is a trustee,to the graveyard for burial,to the playing field at Shadwell and of course to the
